actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
The Speaker laid before the House a privileged concurrent resolution from the Senate.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate from March 17, 1989, until April 4, 1989, and a conditional adjournment of the House from March 23 or 24, 1989, until April 3, 1989.

summary.text: Provides for a recess or adjournment of the Senate from March 17 until April 4, 1989, and an adjournment of the House of Representatives from March 23 or 24 until April 3, 1989.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate from March 17, 1989, until April 4, 1989, and a conditional adjournment of the House from March 23 or 24, 1989, until April 3, 1989.
